newsData.title: Apple C.E.O. Gifts Trump Gold
newsData.summary: Tim Cook presented a glass plaque on a gold base to President Trump and pledged an additional $100 billion investment in the U.S. as Trump threatened a 100 percent tariff on foreign semiconductors.

newsData.title: Poland Inks $3.8 Billion Deal to Update F16 Jets in Defense Push
newsData.summary: Poland has signed a $3.8 billion deal to upgrade its F16 jets.

newsData.title: Russia Offers Classes for Handling Drone Hits at Energy Sites
newsData.summary: Russia is offering classes on how to handle drone strikes at energy facilities.
